timeline.bodyText: There is an extra .0 here now.
timeline.author: pshipton
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -142,24 +153,10 @@ The v0.18 release contains the following known issues and limitations: Manual builds on other platforms are possible by following our detailed build instructions. -#897 -Javadoc not building some OpenJ9 extensions. -All platforms (OpenJDK 8 only) -Some API documentation is missing in the build/<platform>/docs directory. -None - - -#898 -Javadoc building some unsupported OpenJ9 extensions. -All platforms (OpenJDK 8 only) -Some API documentation in build/<platform>/docs is not supported with OpenJ9. -None - - ## Other changes -A full commit history for this release is available at [Eclipse OpenJ9 v0.18.0](https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/releases/tag/openj9-0.18.0). +A full commit history for this release is available at [Eclipse OpenJ9 v0.18.0.0](https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/releases/tag/openj9-0.18.0).

replies.bodyText: Urgh ... the hazards of global search and replace :-/ Fixed
